title: K/DA Prestige Skins?
body:
https://imgur.com/06yMnUm

Why are there only 2 K/DA skins?
I know Akali and Kaisa also had them.

replies.body:
Kai'Sa and Akali's skins were available for a limited time during events.
As a result, they will never return to the store in any capacity. _(which in my opinion, is a terrible way to treat players)
_

However they can apparently be obtained through the hex tech crafting system.

... That's silly.
Oh well. I already have the non-prestige versions.
